ing: 1 cucumber - peeled, seeded, quartered lengthwise and diced
1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets with liquid
2 tablespoons white vinegar, or to taste
des: "Super easy and absolutely great version of the longer and original recipe for this soup that my grandmother brought from Russia. On a hot summer day, a bowl of this soup is an energizing lift.  Add a piece of of rye or pumpernickel bread served on the side to complete the Russian experience."
ins: Mix the buttermilk, cucumber, beets with their juice, green onions, dill, salt, and vinegar in a bowl; stir to mix thoroughly, and chill, covered, in refrigerator at least 2 hours or overnight for best flavor. Serve cold.
